name: Modern Organisation for Truth Harmony and Economic Realty

address: Plot No-39, Road No-8, Mahavir Nagar,

briefDescription: MOTHER is located at Orissa. We are to introduce ourselves as a leading public benevolent charitable trust, “MOTHER” (Modern Organization for Truth, Harmony & Economic Reality), which  executed  various schemes and  programmes aiming  to strengthen the socio-economic develop process and our voluntary action movement is  broad based with wider sectoral as well as geographical coverage i.e spread over different districts in the state of Odisha. As you know MOTHER’s mission of social repairing and development is manifested in the form of upliftment of helpless women and children downtrodden strata of society, Stopping of social evils like dowry, child labour, woman labour at the hand of illiterate and drunkard man growth in the level of, health, education, culture, consumer consciousness, sanitation, I.T. awareness programme and Road safety awareness programme.
